BR_text.BRsummary: No zip download possible for shared links
BR_text.BRdescription:
When using a shared link I'm only able to download single pictures. When selecting multiple images and clicking on the download button, a login is required.
 Is there a way to enable the download of multiple files for shared links OR to disable the download button, when multiple images are selected?

comments_0.comment_text: Good catch, should be fixed with the next build in about one hour :)

comments_1.comment_text:
Works with the new version!
 Thank you :)
